title: Someone from riot please respond.
body: I have been stuck in the account recovery process for almost a week after someone got onto my account and spent all of my RP.  I have no desire to have the RP anymore and would just like to be able to play league again.  If it would be at all possible, could someone let me know if I could just have my account reactivated. Thank You.

replies.body: It looks like an account specialist is already in contact with you, and will be able to help you out with this.  Feel free to ask him any questions you have, and he'll be glad to clear things up.  Good luck!
